name: The Great Stroke-Off!
description:
A classic point-and-click cartoony styled adventure game with an amusing storyline,  silly puzzles to solve, wacky humor and odd-ball characters. :D 

Several years ago I came up with the idea, story-for and  programmed this little game  (a couple of other peeps did the graphics, music and a some work on a side-game within the game). I figured I'd dust it off  and   add it to my profile here. The game should  work   with Windows on PC. See the included ReadMe file in the ZIP download for more details about the game and how to play it.
